00045 Entree& Champ_Fonc_MED_Table_Temps::readOn( Entree& is )
00046 {
00047   Motcle mot;
00048 
00049   is >> mot;
00050   if (mot=="table_temps")
00051     {
00052       Lecture_Table lec_table;
00053       lec_table.lire_table(is,la_table);
00054     }
00055   else
00056     {
00057       Cerr << "Error while reading " << que_suis_je() << ". We expected a time table."<< finl;
00058       Process::exit();
00059     }
00060 
00061   return Champ_Fonc_MED::readOn( is );
00062 }
00063 
00064 void Champ_Fonc_MED_Table_Temps::lire_donnees_champ(const std::string& fileName, const std::string& meshName, const std::string& fieldName,
00065                                                     ArrOfDouble& temps_sauv, int& size, int& nbcomp, Nom& type_champ)
00066 {
00067 #ifdef MEDCOUPLING_
00068   MCAuto<MEDFileFieldMultiTS> ft1(MEDFileFieldMultiTS::New(fileName,fieldName));
00069   std::vector<double> tps;
00070   std::vector< std::pair<int,int> > tst = ft1->getTimeSteps(tps);
00071 
00072   temps_sauv.resize_array(1);
00073 
00074   int first_iter  = tst[0].first;
00075   int first_order = tst[0].second;
00076   temps_sauv[0] = tps[0];
00077 
00078 // Only one MCAuto below to avoid double deletion:
00079   MCAuto<MEDCouplingField> ffield = ReadField(field_type, fileName, meshName, 0, fieldName,
00080                                               first_iter, first_order);
00081   MEDCouplingFieldDouble * field = dynamic_cast<MEDCouplingFieldDouble *>((MEDCouplingField *)ffield);
00082   if (field == 0)
00083     {
00084       Cerr << "ERROR reading MED field! Not a MEDCouplingFieldDouble!!" << finl;
00085       Process::exit(-1);
00086     }
00087   size = field->getNumberOfTuplesExpected();
00088   nbcomp = (int) field->getNumberOfComponents();
00089 
00090   if (field_type == MEDCoupling::ON_NODES)
00091     {
00092       if ((cell_type == INTERP_KERNEL::NORM_QUAD4) || (cell_type == INTERP_KERNEL::NORM_HEXA8))
00093         type_champ = "Champ_Fonc_Q1_MED";
00094       else
00095         type_champ = "Champ_Fonc_P1_MED";
00096     }
00097   else if (field_type == MEDCoupling::ON_CELLS)
00098     type_champ = "Champ_Fonc_P0_MED";
00099 
00100   vrai_champ0_.typer(type_champ);
00101   fixer_nb_comp(nbcomp);
00102   le_champ0().fixer_nb_comp(nbcomp);
00103   zonebidon_inst.associer_zone(mon_dom.valeur().zone(0));
00104   le_champ0().associer_zone_dis_base(zonebidon_inst);
00105   if (zonebidon_inst.nb_elem()==0) size = 0;
00106   le_champ0().fixer_nb_valeurs_nodales(size);
00107   if (size != le_champ0().valeurs().dimension(0))
00108     {
00109       Cerr << "Error in " << que_suis_je() << " : nb_ddl incorrect" << finl;
00110       Process::exit();
00111     }
00112   const double *field_values = field->getArray()->begin();
00113   assert(field->getNumberOfTuplesExpected() == le_champ0().valeurs().dimension(0));
00114   assert((int) field->getNumberOfComponents() ==
00115          (le_champ0().valeurs().nb_dim() == 1 ? 1 : le_champ0().valeurs().dimension(1)));
00116   memcpy(le_champ0().valeurs().addr(), field_values,
00117          le_champ0().valeurs().size_array() * sizeof(double));
00118 #endif
00119 }
00120 
00121 void Champ_Fonc_MED_Table_Temps::lire(double t, int given_it)
00122 {
00123 #ifdef MED_
00124 #ifndef MEDCOUPLING_
00125   Cerr << "Error while reading " << que_suis_je() << ". MEDCoupling library is mandatory." << finl;
00126   Process::exit();
00127 #endif
00128 #endif
00129 
00130   if (zonebidon_inst.nb_elem()>0)
00131     {
00132       double frac = la_table.val(t);
00133       const DoubleTab& vals0 = le_champ0().valeurs();
00134       DoubleTab& vals = le_champ().valeurs();
00135 
00136       vals = vals0;
00137       vals *=frac;
00138     }
00139   Champ_Fonc_base::mettre_a_jour(t);
00140   le_champ().Champ_Fonc_base::mettre_a_jour(t);
00141 }
